item.title: Use your oculus rift completly offline
item.author: Author
item.description: Introduction With the recent turn of events (upcoming requirement of a facebook account to use your oculus), I finally decided to get my oculus working fully offline, but it was harder than I thought. First Attempt Indeed, if you can use your headset without an internet connection, you still need to have the oculus software installed. So, after some research, I came across this topic where a user describes how to backup the installer files to use it offline.
